ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network

Class DrawingSyncDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network.DrawingSyncDialog

  • public class DrawingSyncDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for displaying the status of remote connection establishment. This class does not contain any lifecycle but rather provides methods for displaying lifecycle status and prompting user responses.

    • Field Summary

        titleId - the title of the dialog

      • promptForConfirmation

        public void promptForConfirmation(int progress,
                                  java.lang.String message,
                                  androidx.core.util.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean> onAction)
        Set the progress and message and allow the user to choose "Yes" or "No". The message should be phrased as a question.
        Parameters:
        progress - the progress to set
        message - the question to ask
        onAction - the consumer for the user's response; true if yes

        Dismiss the dialog.
